title: Find Office Space for a Tenant
description: A tenant representative agent must find suitable office space for a client.

tasks.description: Identify the client's requirements: location, square footage, budget, and specific needs (e.g., conference rooms).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a clear, documented list of the client's needs.

tasks.description: Search commercial listing databases (e.g., CoStar, LoopNet) for available properties that match the criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of 5-10 potential properties.

tasks.description: Prepare a tour book of the selected properties and schedule a day of tours with the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a professional tour package and schedules the property tours.
